statements: DELETE FROM architectural_projects WHERE project_architect = 'John Doe' AND project_year > 2010;
DELETE FROM designs WHERE designer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM architectural_projects WHERE completion_year < 2000 AND project_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Projects WHERE completion_year < 2010 AND architect_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM ArchitecturalProjects WHERE project_name = 'Skyscraper Project';
DELETE FROM ProjectTags WHERE tag_name = 'Modern Architecture';
